generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: License and notices in documentation
obligations.verbatim:
2. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce applicable copyright statements and notices, this list of conditions, and the following disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 5. Due credit should be given to the OpenLDAP Project.

generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve License and notices in source code
obligations.verbatim:
1. Redistributions of source code must retain copyright statements and notices.
3. Redistributions must contain a verbatim copy of this document.

generic: Do not use project or contributor names for endorsement or promotion.
obligations.name: No use of names for endorsment
obligations.verbatim: 4. The names and trademarks of the authors and copyright holders must not be used in advertising or otherwise to promote the sale, use or other dealing in this Software without specific, written prior permission.

obligations.name: Respect trademarks
obligations.verbatim: 4. The names and trademarks of the authors and copyright holders must not be used in advertising or otherwise to promote the sale, use or other dealing in this Software without specific, written prior permission.
